geometry_settings.geometry_description: DBD plasma reactor treats the sample between two circular electrodes; a circular dielectric barrier covers the upper electrode. The diameter of the electrodes, as well as the diameter and thickness of the dielectric barrier, were measured.

gas_properties.gas_description: The plasma medium (gas) was ambient air without any further treatment or precursors.

food_related_parameters.matrix_description: The target matrix was black peppercorns bought from a local supermarket and sterilized before treatment.

vegetative_bacteria_related_parameters.growth_medium_before_treatment: From -80°C, the stock culture was grown in Tryptic Soy Agar (TSA) for 48 h and then a single colony was inoculated to  Tryptic Soy Broth (TSB). TSA was used for the enumeration after treatment.
vegetative_bacteria_related_parameters.growth_medium_after_treatment: From -80°C, the stock culture was grown in Tryptic Soy Agar (TSA) for 48 h and then a single colony was inoculated to  Tryptic Soy Broth (TSB). TSA was used for the enumeration after treatment.
vegetative_bacteria_related_parameters.inoculation_procedure: 1 ml of the initial inoculum of known concentration was mixed with the treatment matrix and let dry for 30 min at room temperature.
vegetative_bacteria_related_parameters.enumeration/quantification_procedure: Samples were immediately analyzed after treatment through homogenization with physiological salt solution (PPS) followed by serial dilution. A 0.1 ml aliquot of each dilution was plated on TSA, and incubated.

target_treatment.spatial_location_relative_to_the_plasma_: The peppercorns were placed directly between the two electrodes of the DBD device. The product was exposed simultaneously to plasma-generated reactive species, charged particles, and UV / VUV irradiation emitted uniformly from the electrode surfaces.

diagnostic_settings.setting_description: RONS in the plasma-processed medium were determined with FTIR spectroscopy with the following settings: absorption path length 0.25m, resolution 0.6 cm⁻¹, wavenumber range of 4000 – 400 cm⁻¹, 64 scans in each measurement.

diagnostic_methodology.methodology_description: After the plasma discharge reached steady-state conditions, FTIR measurements of reactive species were conducted in the gas phase adjacent to the peppercorns placed between the electrodes, using a device (specify brand and model).
diagnostic_methodology.location_of_the_diagnostic_application: The plasma gas phase was sampled 1 cm above the peppercorn surface, within the discharge region between the two electrodes.
diagnostic_methodology.Targets_of_qualitative_/_quantitative_an: Hydrogen peroxide (H₂O₂), Ozone (O₃), Nitrate (NO), Nitrite (NO₂). FTIR spectroscopy, specific peak centers: 1400 cm⁻¹ and 876 cm⁻¹ for H₂O₂; 1050 cm⁻¹ for O₃; 1875 cm⁻¹ for NO; and 1600 cm⁻¹ and 2900 cm⁻¹ for NO₂.
diagnostic_methodology.quantification_method: Calibration curves based on known standards for H₂O₂, O₃, NO, NO

data_processing.data_processing_description: Spectral deconvolution and baseline correction using a data analysis software (specify), and Savitzky-Golay smoothing. Peaks were identified via an atomic spectra database (specify).
